text: Dar on co, ki Zakarijo alajhissalom in holatro did va mehruʙonii Allohro nisʙat ʙa Marjam musohida kard, az Alloh xost, to uro farzande ʙidihad. In dar hole ʙud, ki u az dostani farzand noumed suda ʙud. Pas guft: "Parvardigoro! Az coniʙi xud farzandi neku ʙaroi man ato farmo! Hamono Tu sunavandai du'o hasti
